트랄로크 현모 2020

팀은 평등하고 게임은 공정하며 결과는 정의로울 것 입니다 · 그것이 현모니까 (끄덕)

2020 현모에 오신 여러분을 환영합니다. 권모술수가 난무하고 정정당당한 선동과 날조가 기본소양인 트롤 여러분의 능력을 마음껏 뽐낼 수 있는 시간이 돌아왔습니다! 올해도 힘내서 원하시는 만큼 트롤링에 성공하시기를 진심으로 기원합니다.

두근두근 밸런스게임

화면에 뜨는 밸런스게임의 문제를 보고 파트너와 동시에 마음에 드는 쪽을 외칩니다. 파트너와 같은 답을 골랐을 경우 성공, 다른 답을 골랐을 경우 실패입니다.

ㅁㄴㅇㄻㄴㅇㄹ

초성게임

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

뿅


prev next

무엇에 쓰는 물건인고?

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

당신의 기록

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

Awards & Certifications

  • Google Analytics Certified Developer
  • Mobile Web Specialist - Google Certification
  • 1 st Place - University of Colorado Boulder - Emerging Tech Competition 2009
  • 1 st Place - University of Colorado Boulder - Adobe Creative Jam 2008 (UI Design Category)
  • 2 nd Place - University of Colorado Boulder - Emerging Tech Competition 2008
  • 1 st Place - James Buchanan High School - Hackathon 2006
  • 3 rd Place - James Buchanan High School - Hackathon 2005
